content:
TITLE: Creating a Git Branch for Pull Requests
DESCRIPTION: Shell commands for creating a new git branch from master for implementing fixes or features. This is the first step in the pull request workflow.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git checkout -b my-fix-branch master
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebasing and Force Pushing to Update a Pull Request
DESCRIPTION: Shell commands for updating a pull request after receiving feedback. This rebases the branch on master and force pushes the updated branch to GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git rebase master -i
git push origin my-fix-branch -f
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Changes Locally
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for building changes locally using gulp to ensure all tests pass before pushing changes to GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
gulp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Committing Changes in Git
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for committing changes with the -a flag, which automatically adds and removes edited files from the staging area before committing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git commit -a
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing a Branch to GitHub
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for pushing a local branch to a remote GitHub repository, making it available for creating a pull request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git push origin my-fix-branch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Local Master from Upstream
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for updating the local master branch with the latest changes from the upstream repository using fast-forward merge.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git pull --ff upstream master
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deleting a Remote Branch After Merge
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for deleting a remote branch on GitHub after the pull request has been merged, as part of repository cleanup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git push origin --delete my-fix-branch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Switching Back to Master Branch
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for checking out the master branch with the force flag after a pull request is merged, ensuring a clean working state.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git checkout master -f
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deleting a Local Branch After Merge
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for deleting the local feature branch after a pull request has been merged, as part of repository cleanup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git branch -D my-fix-branch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Issue Reporting Template
DESCRIPTION: A markdown template for reporting bugs or issues. It requests system information, reproduction steps, expected results, actual outcomes, and supporting evidence like code, logs, or screenshots.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
System information (OS, Device, etc):

What steps will reproduce the problem:
1.
2.
3.

What is the expected result?

What happens instead of that?

Code, logs, or screenshot that illustrate the problem:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Issue Template for Documentation Questions
DESCRIPTION: A markdown template for submitting questions about missing documentation. It prompts users to explain what they're trying to find, where they've already looked, and where they expected to find the information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/android/snippets.git/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
What are you trying to do or find out more about?

Where have you looked?

Where did you expect to find this information?
```
